description: This file defines a React functional component named 'GlassHeader', which renders a top header bar with brand, project and template selectors, and a save button. It includes CSS styling imported from a separate stylesheet.

methods.name: GlassHeader({ projects = [], templates = [], selectedProject, selectedTemplate, onProjectChange, onTemplateChange, onSaveDraft })
methods.description: React functional component rendering the header UI with project and template selectors and a save button.
